ValidationRule.description: This rule is designed to prevent the Saturday delivery checkbox from being checked, From Friday 3 PM Eastern, as well as on Saturday and Sunday's.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Setup.Americord_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rule__c), $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name != 'payments Profile', text(StageName)="Enrolled", ISCHANGED(StageName), Saturday_Delivery__c = true, OR ( AND ( WEEKDAY(today()) = 6, HOUR(TIMENOW()) >= 19), WEEKDAY(TODAY()) = 1, WEEKDAY(TODAY())= 7 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Saturday Delivery is only available on Friday before 3 PM. If you need special shipping, please contact Five Star Service for rush delivery.
